name: Elaine
greetingText:
Remember the night we met? Our story began at the moment you were about to leave:

"Don't leave."
"...Unless you wanna come with me."
"Yes."
wishText:
To the random romantic who writes like a dream and smells like Marlboro mint—
meeting you was the best plot twist last summer. Hope I’ll always be the one sitting next to you on every late-night flight, no matter where it takes us.

"Happy Valentine’s, Elaine."
